summary: Software Developer with a background of IT at one of the largest non-profit air ambulance companies in the country. Resourceful and agile team player offering the drive to always keep learning and moving forward.

projects.name: CovrLettr
projects.summary: Mad lib style cover letter generator that scores and returns the highest scoring cover letter based on sentiment value.

projects.name: Columns And Rogues
projects.summary: Full Stack rogue-like game where the player dives into a grid mapped game, moving from cell to cell discovering gold, items, monsters and doors to other worlds.

projects.name: QWIXX
projects.summary: A mobile-responsive implementation of the popular Qwixx dice game. Developed with face-to-face simulaneous multiplayer play in mind, each player should run a copy on their own device so they can score on the rolls of other players as well as their own.
